channel.title: What is a vps and how do i use one?
channel.description: so i cant host my server via my personal computer, so i wanted an alternate way to host. can anyone explain what a vps is and how i use it? any further info and maybe recommendations would be nice. thanks

item.title: What is a vps and how do i use one?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[NOOB-FRIENDLY] A VPS is a online computer which stays online even when your computer is off! You can use it in your internet broweser & remote desktop. Its just a online pc that you can host your server on. This also helps keep your server 24/7

Read full topic
item.source: What is a vps and how do i use one?

item.title: What is a vps and how do i use one?
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

Virtual Private Server. You basically buy one, go to your remote desktop connection, connect, transfer your server files, run it on the VPS, it will host the server for you.

Read full topic
